lead_paragraph: ZINN--Martin, born Martin Gene Mendelsohn, April 25, 1947 - September 15, 2015. In remembrance on your birthday, from your loving brother Steven Mendelsohn. New Yorker, inveterate newspaper reader, baseball fan, caring and generous person. Marty, you may not have cast a long shadow in the wider world, but the people you touched and who touched you are better for knowing you. In all that you were, and in those things that trauma and circumstances prevented you from being, you are loved and remembered. You are missed everyday. Rest in peace Pal. 1/3
